nodes.text: The Artorias communication center handled electronic communications between the Outer Rim planet of Artorias and the rest of the galaxy.

In 25 ABY, the center's comm interlink had been damaged, and resulted in knocking the station offline. A Human mechanic named Sparky was assigned the task of fixing the interlink but was unsuccessful. Sparky desperately sought the assistance of a cloaked man who pretended to fix it but did nothing since he was an advance agent of a Yuuzhan Vong fleet. During the Yuuzhan Vong invasion of Artorias, the communications center was left offline, therefore preventing communications between the planet and the New Republic.
